name: Pirates RPG
description:
Become a Pirate and sail the high seas looking for treasure! Plunder for gold, fight other pirates and search for islands based on your location in real life to earn booty and experience!

Features:
*Multiplayer online Pirate RPG for the iPhone, iPod, and iPad.
*Buy islands based on your location in real life! Pillage islands that you don't own to get gold!
*Buy and sell upgrades at the Pirate Market
*Upgrade your stats after gaining experience points to become a better Pirate!
*Invite your friends via friend codes to grow your crew.
*GameCenter Leaderboard and Achievements
*Free updates with new features, jobs, and weapons.
*Facebook or Cell Phone Login so you can transfer your account between devices
*Capture other Pirate's islands. Islands provide recurring gold.
*Upgrade your own islands so they are harder to capture.

If you're a fan of Mob Wars, Mafia Wars, iMob, Vampires, iVampires, or other online role playing games, check out Pirates!



AVAST!
This game requires a Facebook account or a cell phone number for login. This is used so you can reconnect to your account if you change devices.

Pirates is an online game only. iPod Touch users need to be connected to WiFi to play. Pirates is a location-based game, in order to purchase islands in the game, your device must be able to use the built-in the location sensor. Facebook is required to use this game.

Play Pirates on the web:
https://piratewarsonline.com
